Package server

Class ServerModel

java.lang.Object
server.ServerModel
public class ServerModel extends Object
Contains the logic for creating the server socket and handling the chatlog.
Version:
1.0 3/2/2022
Author:
Mirco Ghadri, Ramza Josoph, Valeria Nafuna, Zakariya Omar, "Group 3"
